titles.title: Honoring the the American Kennel Club on its 140th anniversary.
Honoring the the American Kennel Club on its 140th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary:
This resolution congratulates the American Kennel Club (AKC) on its 140th anniversary.
The resolution thanks the AKC and its clubs for their continued commitment to responsible dog ownership and the well-being of all dogs.
